item.title: T2 Error - PLEASE HELP
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

Try disabling things using the force text packet (sendFrame126).

Here are some things you can comment-out:
– denotes a separation between items.

[code=java]
mymessage();

	getPA().handleLoginText();

–
getPA().totallevelsupdate();

	clearQInterface();

–
getItems().sendWeapon(playerEquipment[playerWeapon], getItems().getItemName(playerEquipment[playerWeapon]));
getItems().resetBonus();
getItems().getBonus();
getPA().sendFrame126(“Combat Level: “+getCombatLevel()+””, 3983);
getItems().writeBonus();

	getPA().clearClanChat();[/code]

Read full topic

item.title: T2 Error - PLEASE HELP
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

angle2000555:

still a bunch of t2 errors but the errors are on the client cmd when you log in not the sources cmd

Yeah, the source doesn’t get T2 errors. Lol…

Hmm. You could try a synchronized statement to see if that fixes anything…
Try this replacement (initialize again):

public void initialize() { String title = ""; switch(playerRights) { case 1: title = "<shad=440119>Donator"; break; case 2: title = "<shad=12595455>[Super Donator]"; break; case 3: title = "<col=800000000><shad=14116102>[Coder]"; break; case 4: title = "<shad=60811334>Dicer"; break; case 5: title = "<shad=60811334>Server Helper"; break; case 6: title = "<col=255>Moderator"; break; case 7: title = "<shad=16776960>[Administrator]"; break; case 8: title = "<shad=15007744>[Owner]"; break; default: title = "<shad=60811334>Player"; break; } synchronized (this) { outStream.createFrame(249); outStream.writeByteA(1); outStream.writeWordBigEndianA(playerId); for (int j = 0; j < PlayerHandler.players.length; j++) { if (j == playerId) continue; if (PlayerHandler.players[j] != null) { if (PlayerHandler.players[j].playerName .equalsIgnoreCase(playerName)) disconnected = true; } } for (int i = 0; i < 25; i++) { getPA().setSkillLevel(i, playerLevel[i], playerXP[i]); getPA().refreshSkill(i); } for(int p = 0; p < PRAYER.length; p++) { // reset prayer glows prayerActive[p] = false; getPA().sendFrame36(PRAYER_GLOW[p], 0); } for(int p = 0; p < CURSE.length; p++) { // reset prayer glows curseActive[p] = false; getPA().sendFrame36(CURSE_GLOW[p], 0); } mymessage(); getPA().sendCrashFrame(); getPA().handleWeaponStyle(); getPA().handleLoginText(); accountFlagged = getPA().checkForFlags(); getPA().sendFrame36(505, 0); getPA().sendFrame36(506, 0); getPA().sendFrame36(507, 0); getPA().sendFrame36(508, 1); getPA().sendFrame36(166,4); getPA().sendFrame36(108, 0);//resets autocast button getPA().sendFrame36(172, 1); getPA().sendFrame36(287, 1); getPA().sendFrame107(); // reset screen getPA().setChatOptions(0, 0, 0); // reset private messaging options setSidebarInterface(1, 7101);//check setSidebarInterface(2, 638); setSidebarInterface(3, 3213); setSidebarInterface(4, 1644); setSidebarInterface(5, 5608); getPA().totallevelsupdate(); if(playerMagicBook == 0) { setSidebarInterface(6, 1151); //modern } if(playerMagicBook == 1){ setSidebarInterface(6, 12855); // ancient } if(playerMagicBook == 2){ setSidebarInterface(6, 16640); } if(altarPrayed == 0) { setSidebarInterface(5, 5608); } else { setSidebarInterface(5, 22500); } correctCoordinates(); setSidebarInterface(7, 18128); setSidebarInterface(8, 5065); setSidebarInterface(9, 5715); setSidebarInterface(10, 2449); //setSidebarInterface(11, 4445); // wrench tab setSidebarInterface(11, 904); // wrench tab setSidebarInterface(12, 147); // run tab setSidebarInterface(13, 962); //music tab 6299 for lowdetail. 962 for highdetail setSidebarInterface(14, 29265); //acheivement setSidebarInterface(15, 17000);//blank setSidebarInterface(16, 17011); //summon setSidebarInterface(0, 2423); clearQInterface(); if(lastsummon > 0) { Summoning().SummonNewNPC(lastsummon); } if(xpLock == true) { sendMessage("Your XP is <col=255>locked</col>, to unlock this click the Lock-XP tab."); } else { sendMessage("Your XP is currently <col=255>unlocked</col>, to lock this click the Lock-XP tab."); } if(inWarriorG() && heightLevel == 2) { getPA().movePlayer(2846, 3540, 2); } if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("james")){ getPA().loadAnnouncements(); getPA().showOption(4, 0,"Stalk", 4); getPA().showOption(5, 0,"Rape", 3); getPA().showOption(6, 0,"Rape", 3); } getPA().loadAnnouncements(); getPA().showOption(4, 0,"Follow", 4); getPA().showOption(5, 0,"Trade With", 3); safeTimer = 0; getItems().resetItems(3214); getItems().sendWeapon(playerEquipment[playerWeapon], getItems().getItemName(playerEquipment[playerWeapon])); getItems().resetBonus(); getItems().getBonus(); getPA().sendFrame126("Combat Level: "+getCombatLevel()+"", 3983); getItems().writeBonus(); getItems().setEquipment(playerEquipment[playerHat],1,playerHat); getItems().setEquipment(playerEquipment[playerCape],1,playerCape); getItems().setEquipment(playerEquipment[playerAmulet],1,playerAmulet); getItems().setEquipment(playerEquipment[playerArrows],playerEquipmentN[playerArrows],playerArrows); getItems().setEquipment(playerEquipment[playerChest],1,playerChest); getItems().setEquipment(playerEquipment[playerShield],1,playerShield); getItems().setEquipment(playerEquipment[playerLegs],1,playerLegs); getItems().setEquipment(playerEquipment[playerHands],1,playerHands); getItems().setEquipment(playerEquipment[playerFeet],1,playerFeet); getItems().setEquipment(playerEquipment[playerRing],1,playerRing); getItems().setEquipment(playerEquipment[playerWeapon],playerEquipmentN[playerWeapon],playerWeapon); getCombat().getPlayerAnimIndex(getItems().getItemName(playerEquipment[playerWeapon]).toLowerCase()); getPA().logIntoPM(); getItems().addSpecialBar(playerEquipment[playerWeapon]); saveTimer = Config.SAVE_TIMER; saveCharacter = true; Misc.println("[REGISTERED]: "+playerName+""); int size = playerListSize; handler.updatePlayer(this, outStream); handler.updateNPC(this, outStream); CSLS = 0; if (addStarter) getPA().addStarter(); if (autoRet == 1) getPA().sendFrame36(172, 1); else getPA().sendFrame36(172, 0); if (acceptAid) { acceptAid = false; getPA().sendFrame36(503, 0); getPA().sendFrame36(427, 0); } else { acceptAid = true; getPA().sendFrame36(503, 1); getPA().sendFrame36(427, 1); } getPA().clearClanChat(); flushOutStream(); } Server.clanChat.handleClanChat(this, "Reflux 317"); for (Player p : PlayerHandler.players) { Client player = (Client) p; if (player != null) { player.sendMessage((playerRights > 0 ? ("<img= " + (playerRights - 1) + ">") : "") + title + " " + Misc.formatPlayerName(playerName) + " has logged in."); } } }

Read full topic

item.title: T2 Error - PLEASE HELP
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

Okay, I believe I found your error…

You’re sending packets before the player has fully initialized into game…

Make a backup before doing anything… And you may need to import Misc.

Try this (replace your entire initialize method):

public void initialize() { String title = ""; switch(playerRights) { case 1: title = "<shad=440119>Donator"; break; case 2: title = "<shad=12595455>[Super Donator]"; break; case 3: title = "<col=800000000><shad=14116102>[Coder]"; break; case 4: title = "<shad=60811334>Dicer"; break; case 5: title = "<shad=60811334>Server Helper"; break; case 6: title = "<col=255>Moderator"; break; case 7: title = "<shad=16776960>[Administrator]"; break; case 8: title = "<shad=15007744>[Owner]"; break; default: title = "<shad=60811334>Player"; break; } outStream.createFrame(249); outStream.writeByteA(1); outStream.writeWordBigEndianA(playerId); for (Player p : PlayerHandler.players) { Client player = (Client) p; if (player != null && player.playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(playerName)) { disconnected = true; break; } } for (Player p : PlayerHandler.players) { Client player = (Client) p; if (player != null && !disconnected) { player.sendMessage((playerRights > 0 ? ("<img= " + (playerRights - 1) + ">") : "") + title + " " + Misc.formatPlayerName(playerName) + " has logged in."); } } for (int i = 0; i < 25; i++) { getPA().setSkillLevel(i, playerLevel[i], playerXP[i]); getPA().refreshSkill(i); } for(int p = 0; p < PRAYER.length; p++) { // reset prayer glows prayerActive[p] = false; getPA().sendFrame36(PRAYER_GLOW[p], 0); } for(int p = 0; p < CURSE.length; p++) { // reset prayer glows curseActive[p] = false; getPA().sendFrame36(CURSE_GLOW[p], 0); } mymessage(); getPA().sendCrashFrame(); getPA().handleWeaponStyle(); getPA().handleLoginText(); accountFlagged = getPA().checkForFlags(); //getPA().sendFrame36(43, fightMode-1); getPA().sendFrame36(505, 0); getPA().sendFrame36(506, 0); getPA().sendFrame36(507, 0); getPA().sendFrame36(508, 1); getPA().sendFrame36(166,4); getPA().sendFrame36(108, 0);//resets autocast button getPA().sendFrame36(172, 1); getPA().sendFrame36(287, 1); getPA().sendFrame107(); // reset screen getPA().setChatOptions(0, 0, 0); // reset private messaging options setSidebarInterface(1, 7101);//check setSidebarInterface(2, 638); setSidebarInterface(3, 3213); setSidebarInterface(4, 1644); setSidebarInterface(5, 5608); getPA().totallevelsupdate(); if(playerMagicBook == 0) { setSidebarInterface(6, 1151); //modern } if(playerMagicBook == 1){ setSidebarInterface(6, 12855); // ancient } if(playerMagicBook == 2){ setSidebarInterface(6, 16640); } if(altarPrayed == 0) { setSidebarInterface(5, 5608); } else { setSidebarInterface(5, 22500); } correctCoordinates(); setSidebarInterface(7, 18128); setSidebarInterface(8, 5065); setSidebarInterface(9, 5715); setSidebarInterface(10, 2449); setSidebarInterface(11, 904); // wrench tab setSidebarInterface(12, 147); // run tab setSidebarInterface(13, 962); //music tab 6299 for lowdetail. 962 for highdetail setSidebarInterface(14, 29265); //acheivement setSidebarInterface(15, 17000);//blank setSidebarInterface(16, 17011); //summon setSidebarInterface(0, 2423); clearQInterface(); if(lastsummon > 0) { Summoning().SummonNewNPC(lastsummon); } if(xpLock == true) { sendMessage("Your XP is <col=255>locked</col>, to unlock this click the Lock-XP tab."); } else { sendMessage("Your XP is currently <col=255>unlocked</col>, to lock this click the Lock-XP tab."); } if(inWarriorG() && heightLevel == 2) { getPA().movePlayer(2846, 3540, 2); } if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("james")){ getPA().loadAnnouncements(); getPA().showOption(4, 0,"Stalk", 4); getPA().showOption(5, 0,"Rape", 3); getPA().showOption(6, 0,"Rape", 3); } getPA().loadAnnouncements(); getPA().showOption(4, 0,"Follow", 4); getPA().showOption(5, 0,"Trade With", 3); safeTimer = 0; getItems().resetItems(3214); getItems().sendWeapon(playerEquipment[playerWeapon], getItems().getItemName(playerEquipment[playerWeapon])); getItems().resetBonus(); getItems().getBonus(); getPA().sendFrame126("Combat Level: "+getCombatLevel()+"", 3983); getItems().writeBonus(); getItems().setEquipment(playerEquipment[playerHat],1,playerHat); getItems().setEquipment(playerEquipment[playerCape],1,playerCape); getItems().setEquipment(playerEquipment[playerAmulet],1,playerAmulet); getItems().setEquipment(playerEquipment[playerArrows],playerEquipmentN[playerArrows],playerArrows); getItems().setEquipment(playerEquipment[playerChest],1,playerChest); getItems().setEquipment(playerEquipment[playerShield],1,playerShield); getItems().setEquipment(playerEquipment[playerLegs],1,playerLegs); getItems().setEquipment(playerEquipment[playerHands],1,playerHands); getItems().setEquipment(playerEquipment[playerFeet],1,playerFeet); getItems().setEquipment(playerEquipment[playerRing],1,playerRing); getItems().setEquipment(playerEquipment[playerWeapon],playerEquipmentN[playerWeapon],playerWeapon); getCombat().getPlayerAnimIndex(getItems().getItemName(playerEquipment[playerWeapon]).toLowerCase()); getPA().logIntoPM(); getItems().addSpecialBar(playerEquipment[playerWeapon]); saveTimer = Config.SAVE_TIMER; saveCharacter = true; Misc.println("[REGISTERED]: "+playerName+""); handler.updatePlayer(this, outStream); handler.updateNPC(this, outStream); flushOutStream(); getPA().clearClanChat(); Server.clanChat.handleClanChat(this, "Reflux 317"); CSLS = 0; if (addStarter) getPA().addStarter(); if (autoRet == 1) getPA().sendFrame36(172, 1); else getPA().sendFrame36(172, 0); if (acceptAid) { acceptAid = false; getPA().sendFrame36(503, 0); getPA().sendFrame36(427, 0); } else { acceptAid = true; getPA().sendFrame36(503, 1); getPA().sendFrame36(427, 1); } }

Read full topic

item.title: T2 Error - PLEASE HELP
item.dc:creator: @angle2000555 angle2000555
item.description:
@angle2000555 wrote:

there, and how?

[code=java] public void initialize() {
if (playerRights == 8){
for (int j = 0; j < Server.playerHandler.players.length; j++) {
if (Server.playerHandler.players[j] != null) {
Client c2 = (Client)Server.playerHandler.players[j];
c2.sendMessage("<img=7><shad=15007744>[Owner]" +Misc.optimizeText(playerName)+ " has logged in.");
}
}
}
mymessage();
if (playerRights == 7){
for (int j = 0; j < Server.playerHandler.players.length; j++) {
if (Server.playerHandler.players[j] != null) {
Client c2 = (Client)Server.playerHandler.players[j];
c2.sendMessage("<img=6><shad=16776960>[Administrator]" +Misc.optimizeText(playerName)+ " has logged in.");
}
}
}
if (playerRights == 2){
for (int j = 0; j < Server.playerHandler.players.length; j++) {
if (Server.playerHandler.players[j] != null) {
Client c2 = (Client)Server.playerHandler.players[j];
c2.sendMessage("<img=1><shad=12595455>[Super Donator] “+playerName+” has logged in.");
}
}
}
if (playerRights == 6){
for (int j = 0; j < Server.playerHandler.players.length; j++) {
if (Server.playerHandler.players[j] != null) {
Client c2 = (Client)Server.playerHandler.players[j];
c2.sendMessage("<img=5><col=255>Moderator “+playerName+” has logged in.");
}
}
}
if (playerRights == 3){
for (int j = 0; j < Server.playerHandler.players.length; j++) {
if (Server.playerHandler.players[j] != null) {
Client c2 = (Client)Server.playerHandler.players[j];
c2.sendMessage("<img=2><col=800000000><shad=14116102>[Coder] “+playerName+” has logged in.");
}
}
}
if (playerRights == 1){
for (int j = 0; j < Server.playerHandler.players.length; j++) {
if (Server.playerHandler.players[j] != null) {
Client c2 = (Client)Server.playerHandler.players[j];
c2.sendMessage("<img=0><shad=440119>Donator “+playerName+” has logged in.");
}
}
}
if (playerRights == 5){
for (int j = 0; j < Server.playerHandler.players.length; j++) {
if (Server.playerHandler.players[j] != null) {
Client c2 = (Client)Server.playerHandler.players[j];
c2.sendMessage("<shad=60811334><img=4>Server Helper “+playerName+” has logged in.");
}
}
}
if (playerRights == 4){
for (int j = 0; j < Server.playerHandler.players.length; j++) {
if (Server.playerHandler.players[j] != null) {
Client c2 = (Client)Server.playerHandler.players[j];
c2.sendMessage("<shad=60811334><img=3>Dicer “+playerName+” has logged in.");
}
}
}
if (playerRights == 0){
for (int j = 0; j < Server.playerHandler.players.length; j++) {
if (Server.playerHandler.players[j] != null) {
Client c2 = (Client)Server.playerHandler.players[j];
c2.sendMessage("<shad=60811334>Player “+playerName+” has logged in.");
}
}
}
//synchronized (this) {

			outStream.createFrame(249);
		outStream.writeByteA(1);		// 1 for members, zero for free
		outStream.writeWordBigEndianA(playerId);
		for (int j = 0; j < Server.playerHandler.players.length; j++) {
			if (j == playerId)
				continue;
			if (Server.playerHandler.players[j] != null) {
				if (Server.playerHandler.players[j].playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(playerName))
					disconnected = true;
			}
		}
		for (int i = 0; i < 25; i++) {
			getPA().setSkillLevel(i, playerLevel[i], playerXP[i]);
			getPA().refreshSkill(i);
		}
		for(int p = 0; p < PRAYER.length; p++) { // reset prayer glows 
			prayerActive[p] = false;
			getPA().sendFrame36(PRAYER_GLOW[p], 0);	
		}
		for(int p = 0; p < CURSE.length; p++) { // reset prayer glows 
			curseActive[p] = false;
			getPA().sendFrame36(CURSE_GLOW[p], 0);	
		}
			getPA().sendCrashFrame();
		getPA().handleWeaponStyle();
		getPA().handleLoginText();
		accountFlagged = getPA().checkForFlags();
		//getPA().sendFrame36(43, fightMode-1);
			getPA().sendFrame36(505, 0);
			getPA().sendFrame36(506, 0);
			getPA().sendFrame36(507, 0);
			getPA().sendFrame36(508, 1);
			getPA().sendFrame36(166,4);
		getPA().sendFrame36(108, 0);//resets autocast button
		getPA().sendFrame36(172, 1);
		getPA().sendFrame36(287, 1);
		getPA().sendFrame107(); // reset screen
		getPA().setChatOptions(0, 0, 0); // reset private messaging options
		setSidebarInterface(1, 7101);//check
		setSidebarInterface(2, 638);
		setSidebarInterface(3, 3213);
		setSidebarInterface(4, 1644);
		setSidebarInterface(5, 5608);
		getPA().totallevelsupdate();
		if(playerMagicBook == 0) {
			setSidebarInterface(6, 1151); //modern
		}
		if(playerMagicBook == 1){
			setSidebarInterface(6, 12855); // ancient
		}
		if(playerMagicBook == 2){
			setSidebarInterface(6, 16640);
		}
		if(altarPrayed == 0) {
		setSidebarInterface(5, 5608);
			} else {
		setSidebarInterface(5, 22500);
		}
		correctCoordinates();
		setSidebarInterface(7, 18128);		
		setSidebarInterface(8, 5065);
		setSidebarInterface(9, 5715);
		setSidebarInterface(10, 2449);
		//setSidebarInterface(11, 4445); // wrench tab
		setSidebarInterface(11, 904); // wrench tab
		setSidebarInterface(12, 147); // run tab

setSidebarInterface(13, 962); //music tab 6299 for lowdetail. 962 for highdetail
setSidebarInterface(14, 29265); //acheivement
setSidebarInterface(15, 17000);//blank
setSidebarInterface(16, 17011); //summon
setSidebarInterface(0, 2423);
clearQInterface();
if(lastsummon > 0) {
Summoning().SummonNewNPC(lastsummon);
}
/if(totalstored > 0) {
Server.itemHandler.createGroundItem(storeditems[int storeditems], getX(), getY(), 1, getId());
storeditems[int storeditems] = -1;
}/
if(xpLock == true) {
sendMessage(“Your XP is <col=255>locked, to unlock this click the Lock-XP tab.”);
} else {
sendMessage(“Your XP is currently <col=255>unlocked, to lock this click the Lock-XP tab.”);
}
if(inWarriorG() && heightLevel == 2) {
getPA().movePlayer(2846, 3540, 2);
}
//MadTurnipConnection.addDonateItems(this,playerName);
if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“james”)){
getPA().loadAnnouncements();
getPA().showOption(4, 0,“Stalk”, 4);
getPA().showOption(5, 0,“Rape”, 3);
getPA().showOption(6, 0,“Rape”, 3);
}
getPA().loadAnnouncements();
getPA().showOption(4, 0,“Follow”, 4);
getPA().showOption(5, 0,“Trade With”, 3);
safeTimer = 0;
getItems().resetItems(3214);
getItems().sendWeapon(playerEquipment[playerWeapon], getItems().getItemName(playerEquipment[playerWeapon]));
getItems().resetBonus();
getItems().getBonus();
getPA().sendFrame126(“Combat Level: “+getCombatLevel()+””, 3983);
getItems().writeBonus();
getItems().setEquipment(playerEquipment[playerHat],1,playerHat);
getItems().setEquipment(playerEquipment[playerCape],1,playerCape);
getItems().setEquipment(playerEquipment[playerAmulet],1,playerAmulet);
getItems().setEquipment(playerEquipment[playerArrows],playerEquipmentN[playerArrows],playerArrows);
getItems().setEquipment(playerEquipment[playerChest],1,playerChest);
getItems().setEquipment(playerEquipment[playerShield],1,playerShield);
getItems().setEquipment(playerEquipment[playerLegs],1,playerLegs);
getItems().setEquipment(playerEquipment[playerHands],1,playerHands);
getItems().setEquipment(playerEquipment[playerFeet],1,playerFeet);
getItems().setEquipment(playerEquipment[playerRing],1,playerRing);
getItems().setEquipment(playerEquipment[playerWeapon],playerEquipmentN[playerWeapon],playerWeapon);
getCombat().getPlayerAnimIndex(getItems().getItemName(playerEquipment[playerWeapon]).toLowerCase());
getPA().logIntoPM();
getItems().addSpecialBar(playerEquipment[playerWeapon]);
saveTimer = Config.SAVE_TIMER;
saveCharacter = true;
Misc.println("[REGISTERED]: “+playerName+”");
int size = playerListSize;
handler.updatePlayer(this, outStream);
handler.updateNPC(this, outStream);
flushOutStream();
getPA().clearClanChat();
Server.clanChat.handleClanChat(this, “Reflux 317”);
CSLS = 0;
if (addStarter)
getPA().addStarter();
if (autoRet == 1)
getPA().sendFrame36(172, 1);
else
getPA().sendFrame36(172, 0);
//}
if (acceptAid) {
acceptAid = false;
getPA().sendFrame36(503, 0);
getPA().sendFrame36(427, 0);

    } else
    
    acceptAid = true;
    getPA().sendFrame36(503, 1);
    getPA().sendFrame36(427, 1);
}[/code]

Read full topic
